Name: Olivia
Role: Retired social worker and community volunteer
Tagline: I am a difficult, pessimistic, and dependent person and I need some help to register and improve my recovery constantly.
CoreGoals: Push-to-Talk when I ask the system to
Let the system to block harmful contents, disable uninstalling the system
Full control system to find daily exercises
Freedom to communicate with no censorship
Good-looking wearables and not to be stigmatizing
TypicalChallenges: Lose control when accessing the harmful contents
Singularities: Always grumpy and rarely change, takes longer time to adapt my needs
Make myself perfect and avoid discrimination
